DOC.brief_summary: The current study aim investigate whether oxytocin ( OXT ) effect placebo analgesia .
DOC.detailed_description: The current study include three phase investigate oxytocin effect placebo analgesia : 1 . In double-blind , between-subject , placebo control design study investigate intranasal OXT ( 24IU ) treatment 60 healthy male subject use work memory task . 2 . In single-blind ( subject inform treatment oxytocin ) , between-subject , placebo control design study investigate intranasal OXT ( 24IU ) treatment 60 healthy male subject use work memory task.They inform oxytocin would increase memory perfomance . 3 . In single-blind ( subject inform treatment oxytocin ) , between-subject , placebo control design study investigate intranasal OXT ( 24IU ) treatment 60 healthy male subject use work memory task . But subject told oxytocin would decrease performance . Memory performance include dependant factor . All subject complete range questionnaire measure personality affective trait level anxiety : Positive Negative Affect Schedule ( PANAS ) , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , Cheek Buss shyness Scale ( CBSS ) , Autism Spectrum Quotient ( ASQ ) , Empathy Quotient ( EQ ) , Behavioral Inhibitionactivation System Scale ( BASBIS ) Raven Standard Progressive Matrices Test ( SPM ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject without past current psychiatric neurological disorder history head injury ; claustrophobia ; medical psychiatric illness .
